title: Ask AI
subtitle: Ask AI anything you want
detail: Hi there! Welcome, dear friend, to my website! I'm so happy you're here. I want to let you know that you can chat with the latest LLM model completely free of charge. I'm happy to say that we currently have four models you can chat with: LLaMa 3 by Meta AI, Gemma 2 by Google, Mixtral by Mistral, and GPT-3.5-Turbo by OpenAI. Just a heads-up: each query or question is totally independent, so the AI won't remember your previous question. If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm here to help! ðŸ˜Š
